serverSettings.title: Language Server Configurations
serverSettings.description: Configuration to be sent to language server over LSP when initialized: see the specific language server's documentation for more

priority.title: Priority of the server
priority.description: When multiple servers match specific document/language, the server with the highest priority will be used

language_servers.title: Language Server
language_servers.description: Language-server specific configuration, keyed by implementation

setTrace.title: Ask servers to send trace notifications
setTrace.description: Whether to ask server to send logs with execution trace (for debugging). To see these messages, set loggingLevel to debug or log. Accepted values are: "off", "messages", "verbose". Servers are allowed to ignore this request.
